name: allWorkspaces
description: The `/workspaces` endpoint returns a list of all [workspaces](https://www.getpostman.com/docs/v6/postman/workspaces/intro_to_workspaces) that is accessible by you. The list includes your own workspaces and the workspaces that you have access to. The response contains an array of collection information containing the `name`, `id`, and `type` of each workspace. > Requires API Key as `X-Api-Key` request header or `apikey` URL query parameter.
